date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Helmet
date.ItemBlackDes: 和矿井里的头灯作用差不多，能拓展视野。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: It's similar to the headlights in the mine, which can expand the vision.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Gauntlets
date.ItemBlackDes: 用一种采自地下的天然发光矿石打磨而成。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: It is polished with a natural luminous ore from underground.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Belt
date.ItemBlackDes: 说实话，我是不知道发光的皮带有什么用。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: To be honest, I don't know what the use of luminous belt is.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light War Boots
date.ItemBlackDes: 每走一步都会留下一个短暂发光的脚印，路痴的福音。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Every step will leave a short shining footprints, the gospel of Lu Chi.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Trousers
date.ItemBlackDes: 走路一闪一闪，走在路上能吸引不少人的眼球。（特别是晚上）
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Walk a flash, walk on the road can attract many people's attention. (especially at night)

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Chain
date.ItemBlackDes: 怕黑的女孩子会用，既漂亮，又能驱散黑暗。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: The girl who is afraid of the dark can use it, which is beautiful and can dispel the darkness.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Ring
date.ItemBlackDes: 很多人结婚会选择的款式，就让这光照亮我们对彼此的爱。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Many people will choose the style of marriage, let this light illuminate our love for each other.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Jewelry
date.ItemBlackDes: bulingbuling的闪着光，受到很多孩子喜欢，不知不觉间成了玩具。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: The blinking light of bulingbuling is loved by many children and unconsciously becomes a toy.

date.ItemName_EN: Legend Artifact：Legend Of Holy Light Amulet
date.ItemBlackDes: 圣光会庇护你!前提是你得相信它，不过相信的人好像最后都死了。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: The Holy Light will protect you! Provided that you have to believe it, but the person who believes seems to be dead in the end.

date.ItemName: 圣光传说战刃;圣光传说战刃;圣光传说之弓

date.ItemName: 传承:圣光传说战刃;传承:圣光传说之杖;传承:圣光传说之弓
date.ItemBlackDes: 富含光之力的刀，斩破一切暗与恶。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: The sword full of light power cuts through all darkness and evil.

date.ItemBlackDes: 大晚上穿战的话可以出去恶作剧吓到不少人。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: If you wear war at night, you can go out to prank and scare many people.

date.ItemBlackDes: 艾丽给自己的孩子做的小玩意,不知哪一天被孩子弄到哪里去了。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Ellie's gadget for her children, I don't know where she got it one day.

date.ItemBlackDes: 小时候你也想拥有和钢铁侠一样的头盔吧，坚固无比。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: When you were a kid, you wanted to have the same helmet as iron man. It's very strong.

date.ItemBlackDes: 金手套，银手套，都不如外婆给你织的小手套。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Gold gloves and silver gloves are not as good as the little gloves weave for you.

date.ItemBlackDes: 戴起来沉甸甸的玩意儿，别嫌弃它，伤害大着呢。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: Wear heavy stuff, don't let it go, it hurts a lot.

date.ItemBlackDes: 越长大越喜欢这种银闪闪的东西。
date.ItemBlackDes_EN: The older I grow, the more I like this silver glitter.
